user.title: Set up MQTT sky sync for your Huerizon device
user.description: Click Submit to add Huerizon, then open Configure to pick camera and lights.

init.title: Huerizon Options
init.description: Choose how to read sky color data and which lights to sync.

data_description.source_mode: Choose whether Huerizon reads a single JSON state or three separate entities.
data_description.json_sensor: Select the sensor that publishes a JSON payload with hue, saturation, and brightness.
data_description.hue_scale: If not set to Auto, tell Huerizon how hue is scaled.
data_description.percent_scale: If not set to Auto, tell Huerizon how saturation and brightness are scaled.
data_description.target_lights: Lights that will be synchronized to the sky color.
